objective:
I work as a Software Engineer with a keen interest in technological innovations. I strive to build efficient and impactful technological products to solve modern day health and business problems with machine learning and technology.

I have extensive experience in health research as well as mentoring students and junior members during my time at Stanford University, University of Tokyo, University of Illinois, and FPT Software.

I have one year of professional software engineering experience, three years of general project management experience, and five years of academic research experience.
